title: Q6 - What happens if a Data Fiduciary fails to comply — does liability sit only with the company, or can directors and officers also be held responsible?
description: The primary liability rests with the organization as the Data Fiduciary. Penalties of up to ₹250 crore can be imposed by the Board depending on the nature and severity of the violation.
